thread.title: Happy Tennis Mum!
thread.title_full: Ticketmaster Resale reviewed by Happy Tennis Mum!

author: Happy Tennis Mum!
title: Happy Tennis Mum!
text: I made a last minute decision to buy a ticket to the Aus Open Men's Final for my tennis-fanatic son for his birthday. The event was sold out well in advance but I was able to get a great ticket, for about the same price as I would have paid originally, and give him the present of his dreams! Federer vs. Nadal - unforgettable! I will definitely be checking ticket resales in the future.
